dict.acceptation: 选举，当选；选举权；[神]神的选择；

sent.orig: Donations received are to meet the Candidate's election expenses for the 2002 Chief Executive Election.
sent.trans: 所获捐赠是为支付上述候选人参与2002年行政长官选举的选举开支。

sent.orig: Belarus held a presidential election on March 19 and announced the official election the following day.
sent.trans: 白俄罗斯于三月十九日举行总统大选，隔日官方公布选举结果。

sent.orig: We understood and observed regulation of election, and accept any decision made by Election Committee.
sent.trans: 本人等明白并遵守选举规定，接受选举委员会的任何决定。

sent.orig: Member of the Election Committee should subscribe to only ONE nomination form election.
sent.trans: 就是次选举，每一位选举委员会委员只可签署一份提名表格。

sent.orig: The proportion of incumbents who seek reelection is high and remarkably constant from election to election.
sent.trans: 在职寻求连任的人在竞选人当中所占的比例是相当高的，历次选举以来这个比例也很稳定。
